Title: The Lucky One
Overview: A Marine travels to Louisiana after serving three tours in Iraq and searches for the unknown woman he believes was his good luck charm during the war.
Keywords: based on novel, wife husband relationship, photo, kennel, playing chess, bomb explosion, iraq veteran
production_companies: Village Roadshow Pictures, DiNovi Pictures, Warner Bros., Langley Park Production
Cast: Zac Efron, Blythe Danner, Taylor Schilling
